login.secure_link_helper: A secure link will be sent to your email inbox.

verify.title: Verify Your Account
verify.success: Your account has been verified successfully
verify.expired_key: This verification link has expired. Please request a new one.
verify.already_verified: This account has already been verified. You can sign in now.
verify.unable_to_verify: Unable to verify account. Please try again or contact support.
verify.check_email: Please check your email for a verification link
verify.error: Account verification failed. Please check your verification link or request a new one.
verify.check_email_help: Check your email for the most recent verification link
verify.check_spam: Check your spam/junk folder if you can't find the email
verify.contact_support: Contact support if you continue to have issues
verify.missing_key_message: Please use the verification link sent to your email address to verify your account.

change_password.title: Change Password
change_password.success: Your password has been changed successfully
change_password.error: Password change failed. Please verify your current password and try again.

close_account.title: Close Account
close_account.warning: This action cannot be undone. All your secrets will be permanently deleted.
close_account.confirm: I understand this action is permanent

password_reset_request._context: Password reset request flow - user requests a reset link
password_reset_request.title: Request Password Reset
password_reset_request.description: Enter your email address below and we'll send you a link to reset your password

password_reset._context: Password reset flow - user sets new password using reset link
password_reset.title: Choose a New Password
password_reset.description: Please enter your new password below. Make sure it's strong and unique to protect your account.

passwordReset.emailSent: An email has been sent to you with a link to reset the password for your account

help.title: Help & Support
help.check_spam_folder: Check your spam or junk folder
help.check_email_spelling: Verify you entered your email address correctly
help.wait_few_minutes: Wait a few minutes - emails can sometimes be delayed
help.try_again: Try requesting a new link if it's been more than 10 minutes
help.use_magic_link_instead: Use the Magic Link option to sign in without a password. Once signed in, you can change your password in Account Settings.
help.account_locked_explanation: After multiple failed sign-in attempts, accounts are temporarily locked for security. Wait 15 minutes and try again, or use Magic Link to sign in.
help.contact_us_description: If you're still having trouble, we're here to help. Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
